name: Lateral Labyrinth
description:
The webplayer build is experimental, I recommend downloading instead.
(Known webplayer issues: bad performance, mouse loses focus in menus, quit nonfunctional)

Made for the 'A Game By its Cover 2022' game jam, based on the 'Famicase Exhibition 2022' entry by Adam Tierney.

A small collection of seemingly impossible mazes. Can you escape?

If you get stuck, don't worry, that's what the internet is for (Press Tab in-game).

Featuring

  • Eight levels in the current version
  • Beautiful programmer art
  • Authentic imageboard simulation
  • Minimalist audio
  • Entertaining minigames
  • Probably no bugs

Note: Life got in the way, so most of the work ended up getting done in the last three days of the jam.
As a result, I did not manage to get nearly as much done as I would have liked.
I will try to release an updated version with more content in future.
